doc:
"Don ""Red"" Barry" https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_%22Red%22_Barry 0 Donald Barry de Acosta (January 11, 1912 – July 17, 1980), known as Red Barry, was an American film and television actor. He was nicknamed "Red" after appearing as the first Red Ryder in the highly successful 1940 film Adventures of Red Ryder; the character was played in later films by "Wild Bill" Elliott and Allan Lane. Barry went on to bigger budget films following Red Ryder, but none reached his previous level of success. He played Red Doyle in the 1964 Perry Mason episode 'The Case of the Simple Simon'. Don ( Red ) Barry also appeared in an episode of ADAM 12 tv series where he ends up being shot after robbing a Bank. A very good episode where he does an outstanding performance. Donald_Barry de Acosta ( January_11_,_1912 – July_17_,_1980 ) , known as Red_Barry , was an_American_film_and_television_actor . He was_nicknamed " Red " after appearing as the_first_Red_Ryder in the_highly_successful_1940_film_Adventures of Red_Ryder ; the_character was_played in later_films by "_Wild_Bill_"_Elliott and Allan_Lane . Barry went on to bigger_budget_films following Red_Ryder , but none reached his_previous_level of success . He played Red_Doyle in the_1964_Perry_Mason_episode ' The_Case of the_Simple_Simon ' . Don_(_Red_)_Barry also appeared in an_episode of ADAM_12_tv_series where he ends_up_being_shot after robbing a_Bank . A_very_good_episode where he does an_outstanding_performance .
